sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script is to insert genius results into Search Signal Genius Result Triggered Event(sys_search_signal_genius_result_triggered_event) table that were triggered prior to Tokyo
		</description>
        <name>Update AIS Triggered Genius ResultsTable</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_search_signal_event');
gr.addQuery('search_results', 'CONTAINS', 'genius');
gr.addQuery('sys_created_on', '>=', gs.daysAgo(90));
gr.query();

while (gr.next()) {
    var rawResults = gr.getValue('search_results');
    var resultsJson = JSON.parse(rawResults);

    for (var results in resultsJson.results) {
        var result = resultsJson.results[results];
        if (result.resultType === 'GENIUS') {
            var glideRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_search_signal_genius_result_triggered_event');

            glideRecord.initialize();
            glideRecord.autoSysFields(false);
            glideRecord.setValue('search_signal_event', gr.getUniqueValue());
            glideRecord.setValue('source_table', result.tableName);
            glideRecord.setValue('card_type', result.cardType);
            glideRecord.setValue('result_doc_id', result.id);
            glideRecord.setValue('sys_created_on', gr.getValue('sys_created_on'));
            glideRecord.setValue('sys_created_by', gr.getValue('sys_created_by'));
            glideRecord.setValue('sys_updated_on', gr.getValue('sys_updated_on'));
            glideRecord.setValue('sys_updated_by', gr.getValue('sys_updated_by'));

            glideRecord.insert();
        }
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-11 18:06:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>11e7f6e153b20110dfe7ddeeff7b12bb</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update AIS Triggered Genius ResultsTable</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Search Signal Event Data" source="com.glide.search.signal_data">a0cdbc4b6d2220100acb70b353433054</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_11e7f6e153b20110dfe7ddeeff7b12bb</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 19:22:09</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
